name: Froggo (itch)
description:
Prototype for a linear, level-based platformer game inspired by Jump King.

Reach the crown to win! Currently only one level.

Controls:

  • [AD] or Left/Right Arrow Keys to Move
  • [SPACE] to Jump - Hold [SPACE] to Jump Higher
  • [S] to Cancel Jump
  • [R] to Restart Level
  • [ESC] to Pause
  • [ENTER] or [SPACE] to Select
